verses.verse: כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> is a רִיב֙ <S%H7379><s%> If there be a controversy בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H582><s%> between men וְנִגְּשׁ֥וּ <S%H5066><s%> and they come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמִּשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> unto judgment וּשְׁפָט֑וּם <S%H8199><s%> that [the judges] may judge וְהִצְדִּ֙יקוּ֙ <S%H6663><s%> them then they shall justify אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצַּדִּ֔יק <S%H6662><s%> the righteous וְהִרְשִׁ֖יעוּ <S%H7561><s%> and condemn אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָשָֽׁע׃ <S%H7563><s%> the wicked

וְהָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> become אִם־ <S%H518><s%> shall be if בִּ֥ן <S%H1121><s%> [be] worthy הַכּ֖וֹת <S%H5221><s%> to be beaten הָרָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> And it shall be if the wicked man וְהִפִּיל֤וֹ <S%H5307><s%> shall cause him to lie down הַשֹּׁפֵט֙ <S%H8199><s%> that the judge וְהִכָּ֣הוּ <S%H5221><s%> and to be beaten לְפָנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> before his face כְּדֵ֥י <S%H1767><s%> according רִשְׁעָת֖וֹ <S%H7564><s%> to his fault בְּמִסְפָּֽר׃ <S%H4557><s%> by a certain number

אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> Forty יַכֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H5221><s%> stripes לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יֹסִ֑יף <S%H3254><s%> he may give him [and] not exceed פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> so יֹסִ֨יף <S%H3254><s%> lest [if] he should exceed לְהַכֹּת֤וֹ <S%H5221><s%> and beat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> than אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> these מַכָּ֣ה <S%H4347><s%> stripes רַבָּ֔ה <S%H7227><s%> him above these with many וְנִקְלָ֥ה <S%H7034><s%> degraded אָחִ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> then thy brother לְעֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5869><s%> your eyes ס
לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַחְסֹ֥ם <S%H2629><s%> Thou shalt not muzzle שׁ֖וֹר <S%H7794><s%> the ox בְּדִישֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H1758><s%> is threshing ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יֵשְׁב֨וּ <S%H3427><s%> dwell אַחִ֜ים <S%H251><s%> If brethren יַחְדָּ֗ו <S%H3162><s%> together וּמֵ֨ת <S%H4191><s%> of them die אַחַ֤ד <S%H259><s%> and one מֵהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> like וּבֵ֣ן <S%H1121><s%> and have no child אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> and has ל֔וֹ לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תִהְיֶ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> become אֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> the wife הַמֵּ֛ת <S%H4191><s%> of the dead הַח֖וּצָה <S%H2351><s%> shall not marry without לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man זָ֑ר <S%H2114><s%> A strange יְבָמָהּ֙ <S%H2993><s%> her husband's brother יָבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> shall go in עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> in וּלְקָחָ֥הּ <S%H3947><s%> unto her and take ל֛וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> her to him to wife וְיִבְּמָֽהּ׃ <S%H2992><s%> and perform the duty of an husband's brother

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> shall be that הַבְּכוֹר֙ <S%H1060><s%> And it shall be [that] the firstborn אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom תֵּלֵ֔ד <S%H3205><s%> which she beareth יָק֕וּם <S%H6965><s%> shall succeed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> in the name אָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> of his brother הַמֵּ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> [which is] dead וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִמָּחֶ֥ה <S%H4229><s%> be not put out שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> that his name מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> does not יַחְפֹּץ֙ <S%H2654><s%> like הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if the man לָקַ֖חַת <S%H3947><s%> not to take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְבִמְתּ֑וֹ <S%H2994><s%> his brother's wife וְעָלְתָה֩ <S%H5927><s%> go up יְבִמְתּ֨וֹ <S%H2994><s%> then let his brother's wife הַשַּׁ֜עְרָה <S%H8179><s%> to the gate אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַזְּקֵנִ֗ים <S%H2205><s%> unto the elders וְאָֽמְרָה֙ <S%H559><s%> and say מֵאֵ֨ין <S%H3985><s%> refuseth יְבָמִ֜י <S%H2993><s%> My husband's brother לְהָקִ֨ים <S%H6965><s%> to raise up לְאָחִ֥יו <S%H251><s%> unto his brother שֵׁם֙ <S%H8034><s%> a name בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is not אָבָ֖ה <S%H14><s%> he will יַבְּמִֽי׃ <S%H2992><s%> not perform the duty of my husband's brother

וְקָֽרְאוּ־ <S%H7121><s%> shall call ל֥וֹ זִקְנֵי־ <S%H2205><s%> Then the elders עִיר֖וֹ <S%H5892><s%> of his city וְדִבְּר֣וּ <S%H1696><s%> him and speak אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> about וְעָמַ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> unto him and [if] he stand וְאָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> [to it] and say לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not חָפַ֖צְתִּי <S%H2654><s%> I like לְקַחְתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3947><s%> not to take

וְנִגְּשָׁ֨ה <S%H5066><s%> come יְבִמְתּ֣וֹ <S%H2994><s%> Then shall his brother's wife אֵלָיו֮ <S%H413><s%> to him לְעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> unto him in the presence הַזְּקֵנִים֒ <S%H2205><s%> of the elders וְחָלְצָ֤ה <S%H2502><s%> and loose נַעֲלוֹ֙ <S%H5275><s%> his shoe מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> and רַגְל֔וֹ <S%H7272><s%> from off his foot וְיָרְקָ֖ה <S%H3417><s%> and spit בְּפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> in his face וְעָֽנְתָה֙ <S%H6030><s%> and shall answer וְאָ֣מְרָ֔ה <S%H559><s%> and say כָּ֚כָה <S%H3602><s%> Thus יֵעָשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> So shall it be done לָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto that man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יִבְנֶ֖ה <S%H1129><s%> that will not build up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָחִֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> his brother's

וְנִקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> shall be called שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> And his name בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> The house חֲל֥וּץ <S%H2502><s%> loosed הַנָּֽעַל׃ <S%H5275><s%> of him that hath his shoe ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִנָּצ֨וּ <S%H5327><s%> strive אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H376><s%> her husband יַחְדָּו֙ <S%H3162><s%> together אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> A man וְאָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> and his countryman וְקָֽרְבָה֙ <S%H7126><s%> draweth near אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> and the wife הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> of the one לְהַצִּ֥יל <S%H5337><s%> for to deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִישָׁ֖הּ <S%H376><s%> her husband מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> out of the hand מַכֵּ֑הוּ <S%H5221><s%> of him that smiteth וְשָׁלְחָ֣ה <S%H7971><s%> him and putteth forth יָדָ֔הּ <S%H3027><s%> her hand וְהֶחֱזִ֖יקָה <S%H2388><s%> and taketh בִּמְבֻשָֽׁיו׃ <S%H4016><s%> him by the secrets

וְקַצֹּתָ֖ה <S%H7112><s%> Then thou shalt cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּפָּ֑הּ <S%H3709><s%> her hand לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תָח֖וֹס <S%H2347><s%> shall not pity עֵינֶֽךָ׃ <S%H5869><s%> thine eye ס

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> have לְךָ֛ בְּכִֽיסְךָ֖ <S%H3599><s%> Thou shalt not have in thy bag אֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> differing וָאָ֑בֶן <S%H68><s%> weights גְּדוֹלָ֖ה <S%H1419><s%> a great וּקְטַנָּֽה׃ <S%H6996><s%> and a small ס

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> have לְךָ֛ בְּבֵיתְךָ֖ <S%H1004><s%> Thou shalt not have in thine house אֵיפָ֣ה <S%H374><s%> differing וְאֵיפָ֑ה <S%H374><s%> measures גְּדוֹלָ֖ה <S%H1419><s%> a great וּקְטַנָּֽה׃ <S%H6996><s%> and a small

אֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> weight שְׁלֵמָ֤ה <S%H8003><s%> [But] thou shalt have a perfect וָצֶ֙דֶק֙ <S%H6664><s%> and just יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> shall have לָּ֔ךְ אֵיפָ֧ה <S%H374><s%> measure שְׁלֵמָ֛ה <S%H8003><s%> a perfect וָצֶ֖דֶק <S%H6664><s%> and just יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> shall have לָּ֑ךְ לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> because of יַאֲרִ֣יכוּ <S%H748><s%> may be lengthened יָמֶ֔יךָ <S%H3117><s%> shalt thou have that thy days עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> in הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> in the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לָֽךְ׃

כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for תוֹעֲבַ֛ת <S%H8441><s%> [are] an abomination יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everyone עֹ֣שֵׂה <S%H6213><s%> For all that do אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> such things כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> everyone עֹ֥שֵׂה <S%H6213><s%> [and] all that do עָֽוֶל׃ <S%H5766><s%> unrighteously פ

זָכ֕וֹר <S%H2142><s%> Remember אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> did לְךָ֖ עֲמָלֵ֑ק <S%H6002><s%> what Amalek בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> unto thee by the way בְּצֵאתְכֶ֥ם <S%H3318><s%> when ye were come forth מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> how קָֽרְךָ֜ <S%H7136><s%> How he met בַּדֶּ֗רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> thee by the way וַיְזַנֵּ֤ב <S%H2179><s%> and smote the hindmost בְּךָ֙ כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַנֶּחֱשָׁלִ֣ים <S%H2826><s%> of thee [even] all [that were] feeble אַֽחַרֶ֔יךָ <S%H310><s%> behind וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you עָיֵ֣ף <S%H5889><s%> thee when thou [wast] faint וְיָגֵ֑עַ <S%H3023><s%> and weary וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and he יָרֵ֖א <S%H3373><s%> and he feared אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> not God

וְהָיָ֡ה <S%H1961><s%> shall come בְּהָנִ֣יחַ <S%H5117><s%> hath given thee rest יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Therefore it shall be when the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֣יךָ ׀ <S%H430><s%> thy God לְ֠ךָ מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֹ֨יְבֶ֜יךָ <S%H341><s%> from all thine enemies מִסָּבִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> round about בָּאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> in the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָֽה־ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱ֠לֹהֶיךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לְךָ֤ נַחֲלָה֙ <S%H5159><s%> thee [for] an inheritance לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <S%H3423><s%> to possess תִּמְחֶה֙ <S%H4229><s%> it [that] thou shalt blot out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֵ֣כֶר <S%H2143><s%> the remembrance עֲמָלֵ֔ק <S%H6002><s%> of Amalek מִתַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> from under heaven לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> must not תִּשְׁכָּֽח׃ <S%H7911><s%> thou shalt not forget פ
